answers.author: Paul Alexander
answers.text:
I would look to Pinellas County.  They have a PMO that has matured to Project Portfolio Management under the PMBOK industry best practices.  The PMO office is a direct report to the Executive Director of the IT organization which operates as an internal service fund.  Under process, the PMO integrates with other offices within the organization for the development of a Strategic Business Plan under the EPAS process discipline from the former Meta (now Gartner) organization.

author: [Anonymous]
text: We are looking to create a Project Management Office, primarily for technology related projects, but would also incorporate components of strategic planning functions.   Are you aware of any cities that have a similar type of office or arrangement? Or even just a Projct Management Office office.  I’m looking primarily for examples of the organizational structure, placement and possibly funding mechanisms (internal service, project funded, cost of service, etc.).
title: Project or Strategic Management Office
